def apply_category_filter(df, col, values):
    return df[df[col].isin(values)]

def plot_pie_chart(df, col):
    fig, ax = plt.subplots()
    df[col].value_counts().plot(kind='pie', ax=ax, autopct='%1.1f%%')
    ax.set_ylabel('')
    st.pyplot(fig)
def plot_scatter(df, col1, col2):
    fig, ax = plt.subplots()
    ax.scatter(df[col1], df[col2], alpha=0.6)
    ax.set_xlabel(col1)
    ax.set_ylabel(col2)

    fig, ax = plt.subplots()

label: dataset_info
missing_value_report
peekOfCode:
def missing_value_report(df):
    report = df.isnull().sum().reset_index()
    report.columns = ["Column", "Missing Values"]
    report["Percentage"] = (report["Missing Values"] / len(df)) * 100
    report = report.sort_values("Missing Values", ascending=False)
    # Ensure string columns are explicitly string type for Streamlit compatibility
    report["Column"] = report["Column"].astype(str)
    return report
